member.summary: Represents the retriable operation to wait for condition safely (without throwing exception on timeout).
member.typeparam: The type of object used to detect the condition.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The input value to pass to the evaluated conditions.

member.name: M:Atata.SafeWait`1.#ctor(`0,OpenQA.Selenium.Support.UI.IClock)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The input value to pass to the evaluated conditions.
The clock to use when measuring the timeout.

member.name: P:Atata.SafeWait`1.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets how long to wait for the evaluated condition to be true. The default timeout is taken from .

member.name: P:Atata.SafeWait`1.PollingInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets how often the condition should be evaluated. The default interval is taken from .

member.name: M:Atata.SafeWait`1.IgnoreExceptionTypes(System.Type[])
member.summary: Configures this instance to ignore specific types of exceptions while waiting for a condition. Any exceptions not whitelisted will be allowed to propagate, terminating the wait.
member.param: The types of exceptions to ignore.

member.name: M:Atata.SafeWait`1.Until``1(System.Func{`0,``0})
member.summary:
Repeatedly applies this instance's input value to the given function until one of the following occurs:
the function returns neither null nor false
the function throws an exception that is not in the list of ignored exception types
the timeout expires
member.param: A delegate taking an object of type T as its parameter, and returning a TResult.
